name: TED Masterclass
description: Are you ready to begin mastering the art of public speaking? TED Masterclass -- TEDs official public speaking course -- will help you identify, develop, and share your best ideas.  With TED Masterclass, you will:  + Learn the process for developing TED-style talks. This course, guided by TEDs Head Curator, Chris Anderson, will help you craft your best ideas into compelling narratives. + Master the key techniques that TED speakers use to deliver great talks. Each technique is taught using vivid animations and clips from celebrated TED Talks.  + Engage in interactive activities, each designed to help you improve your presentation skills. + Gain exclusive insights from TEDs curators on what makes a masterful presentation. + Discover a library of handpicked TED Talks that will illuminate every concept covered within the course.  Full access to the course is available via in-app purchase, and all proceeds support the nonprofit work of TED. The in-app purchase is a one-time payment for unlimited access to TED Masterclass.   To learn more about TED Masterclass, visit masterclass.ted.com
